name: Ravers2Runners
description: Ravers2Runners enables party-people to find and participate in fun, non-judgemental, music oriented runs and running events, helping them to become fitter and healthier.
details: We want to help millions of ravers from around the world become healthier and happier through exercise. The R2R community is an inclusive and non-judgemental space. If you want to move your body and be sociable with like-minded people without it having to be in a nightclub, then weâ€™re the community for you.

time.details: Join us for a fun 5km loop of the centre or BS5 area, intervals or something a little different from time-to-time. We run a steady pace to tunes with a non-judgemental attitude. Check the WhatsApp group for updates on the day!
